concord.neighborhoods: Downtown, Penacook, West Concord, East Concord
concord.meetingHighlights: Stable capital-city meetings with a mix of daytime and evening groups and several faith-based host locations.
concord.transitInfo: Local Concord Coach and city bus services connect Concord to nearby towns; Manchester-Boston Regional Airport (MHT) provides regional air service.

manchester.neighborhoods: Downtown, North End, South End, West Side, Rimmon Heights, Hallsville
manchester.meetingHighlights: Largest AA community in the state with a variety of meetingsâ€”speaker nights, step studies, and newcomer-friendly options.
manchester.transitInfo: Manchester Transit Authority serves local routes; Manchester-Boston Regional Airport (MHT) nearby for regional flights.

nashua.neighborhoods: Downtown, Fairgrounds, Crown Hill, South Nashua
nashua.meetingHighlights: Strong suburban meetings with active evening attendance and several service-oriented groups.
nashua.transitInfo: Nashua Transit System provides local buses; easy driving access to Manchester and Logan/Manchester airports.

portsmouth.neighborhoods: Downtown, South End, The Hill, Middle Street
portsmouth.meetingHighlights: Coastal meetings with a mix of downtown and neighborhood groups; active speaker nights and newcomer support.
portsmouth.transitInfo: COAST and regional bus services connect the Seacoast; Portsmouth International Airport at Pease (PSM) for regional flights.

keene.neighborhoods: Downtown, West Keene, Keene State College area
keene.meetingHighlights: Small-town meetings with strong community ties and student-influenced schedules during the academic year.
keene.transitInfo: Local bus services and regional routes; driving access via NH-10 and nearby regional airports.
